name: AideWiser SolTek
description:
AideWiser was born with a dream to aid a vast spectrum of organisations to prosper and propel towards growth. It is the brainchild of two close friends and motivated professionals. In the contemporary world, companies prefer to outsource functions in order to reduce costs, while getting things done effectively. Our founders understood this and came up with an intelligent idea of AideWiser.
 AideWiser SolTek – An Aide to Your Business!
features: Enhance your team with our efficient hiring. Whether it's IT, non-IT, or lateral hiring, we've got you covered. Streamline recruitment for success.
Explore flexible workforce solutions with our contract staffing service. Easily adapt to project needs, ensuring high-quality temporary talent.
Navigate your career with our expert guidance. Gain essential training, perfect your resume, and walk with confidence towards attaining enduring achievements.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Recruitment matlab AideWiser!
ShortDescription: A Recruitment Tech Startup catering to IT & Non-IT Hiring pan India.
enhanced_description: AideWiser SolTek is a recruitment technology startup aimed at helping a vast spectrum of organizations prosper and achieve growth. It provides efficient hiring services covering IT, non-IT, and lateral roles, along with flexible contract staffing solutions to adapt to project needs and ensure access to high-quality temporary talent. Additionally, AideWiser SolTek offers expert career guidance, essential training, and resume perfection services to individuals. The core business objectives include enabling companies to hire top talent faster and more efficiently, and boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. AideWiser SolTek specializes in IT & Non-IT hiring across India.
key_use_cases: Efficient IT, non-IT, and lateral hiring
Flexible workforce solutions and contract staffing to adapt to project needs
Career guidance, training, and resume development for job seekers
Accelerating talent acquisition and improving hiring efficiency
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Ability to reduce costs through outsourcing staffing functions
Providing flexible workforce solutions and contract staffing
Specialized focus on IT and Non-IT hiring
roi_benefits: Improved hiring manager confidence and productivity
